name: Jameco Medium Roast
about: I was reborn on this day, birthed by this brew. The taste is second only to the draught of the olden gods. Take a sip and revel in the typhoon force of this cup... and be humbled, mortal. And hyper. Be cone with ye.

name: Espresso Roast Verismo
about: I'm never disappointed with anything from Starbuck. I've found that you can get 2 shots of esspresso for each pod. Just press the espreso button twice. I love my lattes strong! Enjoy!

name: Valhalla Java
about: Sweet-toned, delicate, though rather simple. Cocoa and nut in aroma and cup, with faint hints of lemon and flowers. Round, muted acidity; smooth but rather lean mouthfeel. Some flavor carries into the short finish but fades toward astringency in the long.

name: Breakfast Blend
about: This has been my favorite coffee since day one of having my Keurig. You can't messs it up. Every cup is perfect.

name: Ethiopia Amaro Natural
about: Richly complex fruit and flowers in a dry processed, single-origin Ethiopia Epresso.

name: Signature Esspresso
about: Crispy sweet, subtle, engaging my favorite coffee blend by far.

name: TDark Blend
about: I did not like thi particular blend of coffee. I felt like it was just too strong for my teaste

name: Blond Roast
about: I loved this blond roast that I feel is much lighter and sweeter than Starbucks.

name: Chocolate Roast
about: I wished this blend would have tasted a bit more sweet. I feel like it was more of a darker bitter chocolate not really to my taste.
